reporter_caption.center: DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN RESOURCES v. ROTH, 22 (Md. 10-5-2004)

caption.center: Department of Human Resources, Child Care Administration v. Andrea Roth.

opinion.opinion_text:
PER CURIAM ORDER The Court having considered the brief of the appellant and having conducted oral argument in the above-captioned case, it is this 5th day of October, 2004.
ORDERED, by the Court of Appeals of Maryland, that the appeal be, and it is hereby, dismissed. See Maryland Rules 1-323 and 8-502. Costs to be paid by the appellant.
